Name: GLOBAL:SOFAConventions
Comment: Conventions for IRs with a one-to-one correspondence between emitter and receiver. The main application is to store headphone IRs recorded for each emitter and each ear.

Name: GLOBAL:DataType
Comment: We will store IRs here.

Name: GLOBAL:License
Default: No license provided, ask the author for permission

Name: GLOBAL:RoomType
Comment: It can be free field, reverberant, shoebox or dae (see Tab. 6).

Name: SourcePosition
Comment: Headphones position, usually the same as ListenerPosition.

Name: EmitterPosition
Comment: The default the same as ReceiverPosition, reflecting the correspondence of each emitter to each receiver.

Name: Data.SamplingRate
Comment: Sampling rate of the samples in Data.IR and Data.Delay.

Name: Data.SamplingRate:Units
Comment: Unit of the sampling rate.

Name: Data.Delay
Comment: Additional delay of each IR (in samples, with the time interval as described by SamplingRate).

Name: GLOBAL:DatabaseName
Comment: Unique name of the database to which these data belong.

Name: GLOBAL:ListenerShortName
Comment: ID of the subject from the database.

Name: GLOBAL:ListenerDescription
Comment: Narrative description of the listener (or mannequin).

Name: GLOBAL:SourceDescription
Comment: Narrative description of the headphones.

Name: GLOBAL:SourceManufacturer
Comment: Name of the headphones manufacturer.

Name: SourceManufacturers
Comment: Optional M-dependent version of the attribute SourceManufucturer.

Name: GLOBAL:SourceModel
Comment: Name of the headphone model. Must uniquely describe the headphones of the manufacturer.

Name: SourceModels
Comment: Optional M-dependent version of the attribute SourceModel.

Name: GLOBAL:SourceURI
Comment: URI of the headphone specifications.

Name: SourceURIs
Comment: Optional M-dependent version of the attribute SourceURI.

Name: GLOBAL:ReceiverDescription
Comment: Narrative description of the microphones.

Name: ReceiverDescriptions
Comment: M-dependent version of the attribute ReceiverDescription.

Name: GLOBAL:EmitterDescription
Comment: Narrative description of the headphone drivers.

Name: EmitterDescriptions
Comment: E-dependent version of the attribute EmitterDescription.

Name: MeasurementDate
Comment: Optional M-dependent date and time of the measurement.
